doc.after: European scholarship in Sanskrit begun by Heinrich Roth 1620 1668 and Johann Ernst Hanxleden 1681 1731 is considered responsible for the discovery of an Indo European language family by Sir William Jones 1746 1794 This research played an important role in the development of Western philology or historical linguistics 58
